greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(-x, -x^6) in powers of x where f is Ramanujan's two-variable theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ q, q^7] QPochhammer[ q^6, q^7] QPochhammer[ q^7], {q, 0, n}];
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Nov 28 2013
